mapper.insert: insert into tiktok_data (data_id, account_id, `date`, today_diamond_cnt, today_live_cnt, today_new_member_cnt, month_diamond_cnt, month_diamond_pct, month_new_creator_cnt, month_new_creator_diamond_cnt, create_time, update_time) values (#{dataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{todayDiamondCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{todayLiveCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{todayNewMemberCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monthDiamondCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monthDiamondPct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monthNewCreatorCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monthNewCreatorDiamondCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tiktok_data set account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, today_diamond_cnt = #{todayDiamondCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, today_live_cnt = #{todayLiveCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, today_new_member_cnt = #{todayNewMemberCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_diamond_cnt = #{monthDiamondCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_diamond_pct = #{monthDiamondPct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, month_new_creator_cnt = #{monthNewCreatorCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_new_creator_diamond_cnt = #{monthNewCreatorDiamondCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select data_id, account_id, `date`, today_diamond_cnt, today_live_cnt, today_new_member_cnt, month_diamond_cnt, month_diamond_pct, month_new_creator_cnt, month_new_creator_diamond_cnt, create_time, update_time from tiktok_data where data_id = #{dataId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
